name: coterminously
content:

Add to word list
at the same time as something else: The two prison sentences will be served coterminously. See
coterminous
More examplesFewer examplesThe company had multiple leases expiring coterminously.The Commission's members are appointed by the Governor and they serve coterminously with him.Education and recreation must be built coterminously with housing and infrastructure.The evolutionary changes in each new generation of dinosaur fitted the ecological changes occurring coterminously around them.
